snippet: During the 2003 invasion of Iraq, United States forces captured a voluminous archive of documents and recorded meetings that now offer a window into the private world of Saddam Hussein.
lead_paragraph: During the 2003 invasion of Iraq, United States forces captured a voluminous archive of documents and recorded meetings that now offer a window into the private world of Saddam Hussein.

headline.main: Archive Offers Rare Look Into Hussein’s Private Ruminations
headline.seo: Archive Offers Rare Look Into Saddam Hussein’s Thoughts, Strategy
